title: Greek Lemon Chicken Soup Recipe
description: This Greek lemon chicken soup is made with cooked chicken, rice, egg yolks, and lots of fresh lemon juice for a light, flavorful, and comforting meal.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Chicken Soup Recipes Chicken and Rice Soup Recipes Greek Lemon Chicken Soup 4.6 (590) 476 Reviews 62 Photos This easy Greek lemon chicken soup is a perfect introduction to avgolemono, a traditional Greek soup. Serve with fresh pita triangles, and you'll be sure to please your guests! Submitted by Shelley Ross Updated on March 27, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 62 62 62 62 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 50 mins Servings: 16 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 16 servings 8 cups chicken broth ½ cup fresh lemon juice ½ cup shredded carrots ½ cup finely chopped onion ½ cup finely chopped celery 6 tablespoons chicken soup base (see note) ¼ teaspoon ground white pepper ¼ cup butter ¼ cup all-purpose flour 8 egg yolks 1 cup cooked white rice 1 cup diced, cooked chicken meat lemon slices for garnish (Optional) Directions Gather the ingredients. Combine chicken broth, lemon juice, carrots, onions, celery, soup base, and white pepper in a large pot. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Blend butter and flour in a small bowl; gradually stir into soup mixture. Simmer, stirring frequently, for 8 to 10 minutes. Meanwhile, beat egg yolks in a bowl until light in color. Gradually whisk in some hot soup, using a ladle to pour in a thin stream while whisking the egg yolks vigorously. Add egg mixture to the pot in same manner, and heat through. Add rice and chicken; cook until warmed through. Ladle hot soup into bowls and garnish with lemon slices. From the Editor If the chicken broth you are using is already well seasoned, you may not need to add additional chicken base. We recommend tasting the soup after Step 1 and adding chicken base to taste if needed. I Made It Print 880 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Greek Lemon Chicken Soup 01 of 62 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 62 Photo by  Samenia Holsey 06/23/2023 I’m really not a soup person, but this was excellent soup. 03 of 62 Photo by  mommy128 04/06/2022 Loved this soup. 04 of 62 Photo by  Ashley 04/18/2021 This comes out very velvety and lemony. Careful on the amount of lemon juice if you don’t want it to taste strong. I love the lemon flavor but you can add more at any point to get it to your desire taste. 05 of 62 Photo by  Joe Walton 04/02/2021 06 of 62 Photo by  kldebord 01/18/2021 07 of 62 Photo by  Heather Ulle 12/15/2020 08 of 62 Photo by  meagan 10/24/2020 09 of 62 Photo by  Renee Rizzo 05/14/2020 10 of 62 Photo by  Krystal Lynn DuBois 05/02/2020 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Greek Avgolemono Chicken Soup 152 Ratings Instant Pot® Chicken and Quinoa Soup 1 Rating Lemon Chicken Orzo Soup 511 Ratings Passover Soup with Chicken Dumplings 4 Ratings Chicken and Vegetables Soup 5 Ratings Peruvian Chicken Soup (Aguadito de Pollo) 109 Ratings Filipino-Style Congee (Lugaw) 3 Ratings Simple Chicken Florentine Soup 1 Rating Chicken and Wild Rice Soup 12 Ratings Cambodian Lemongrass Chicken Soup 8 Ratings Caldo De Pollo (Mexican Chicken Soup) 27 Ratings Hearty Chicken and Rice Soup 191 Ratings Chicken and Wild Rice Soup with Leeks Cream of Chicken with Wild Rice Soup 313 Ratings Chicken Mulligatawny Soup 4 Ratings Cambodian Chicken Soup 62 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
